name: Thurare
sentences: This text is temporary. There are a lot of bugs in this game.
As you might have noticed, press F to talk to people. The cylinder next to Ukabe is the elevator. Go near it to change floors.
Doors will be represented by walls of a different texture. The teleport is a bit buggy, so make sure to walk into the door head-on instead of at an angle.
Or, you may be teleported outside of the base itself.
The black wall on the first floor is the exit to leave the base. Make sure to talk to the general before you leave.
By the way, don't keep her waiting.
